title: When you get a double kill during lag.
body:
You say http://cdn.meme.am/instances/500x/57357357.jpg

But you know you honestly have no idea how that happened.

replies.body:
I got a triple kill as Riven in ARAM and all I was doing was drumming my fingers over the QWE keys. 
http://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.meme.am%2Finstances%2F500x%2F57357357.jpg&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=425
Lol, one of my friends once pulled off a penta as Jinx with over 1500ms ping.  One of his allies mentioned his ping in all chat, and the enemy team surrendered within 3 seconds.

I was playing Lucian and while I was in a bush I got jumped on by an akali. I started to fight her and all of the sudden I got massive packet loss and all I see if my ho and her hp just drop in chunks. Next thing I know I'm walkin back to base with an extra 300g.
I was playing crit {{champion:86}}  and one time I got stunned in a team fight while my e was on... the whole team jumped on me and I managed to get a triple
Dangit, why didn't I record that one dc pentakill.

I was once on bot-lane with Miss Fortune, pretty fed already and had to take a phone-call. At the exact same moment their Panthe decided to gank... I got a triple kill, doing nothing but right-clicking my target. I didn't take a single step in that entire fight.

I got a double kill in the enemy's jungle yesterday moments after my cats unplugged my router. 

I didn't find out until about 5 minutes later when I got back in.

I sometimes fall asleep and can still play

And triple while reconnecting
